title: french toast
ingredients: 2/3 cup milk; whole preferred, 2% is fine
instructions: Mix eggs, milk and spices well with a whisk. Pour into a shallow baking dish for soaking bread.
Heat pan or griddle over medium heat. Soak bread a minimum of a few seconds each side then place on greased pan.
Cook 2-4 minutes each side until lightly browned and crisp on the edges.
Repeat as needed to use all the bread and batter, adding small chunks of butter as needed.
Serve with maple syrup (and fruit/whipped cream if going decadent)
notes: We use the Whole Foods San Francisco Sourdough. If using standard loaf bread, use 6 slices. Scales at 100%.
